title: Why Still
description:
Description :
        The childhood loser became the perfect man and reappeared in front of the female lead!
His name is ‘Yoon Garam’. He works as an author, and as soon as he heard that the female lead, ‘Yunseo’ works in a small publishing company, he decided to sign a contract there.
“I couldn’t forget you.”
The female lead, Yunseo, is shocked by the sudden confession, but she doesn’t want to embarrass her company. However, from the company’s point of view, his contract terms were too good to decline so they decided to sign the contract, but…!
